trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Flowery Branch
There were no other sightings in Flowery Branch on or around November 11th 2010
divs: Sighting Details2 UFOs moving and hovering around for about a week so far, one looked silvery or mirror-like with red and white lights, and was about as high up as an average plane flies. The other was farther away, and whether it was the color or the lights, looked a little orange. Both were disk-shaped, and hovered, as well as flying in all directions, one did a figure-8, but remained mostly in the same place. They're STILL out there.
Summary: 2 UFOs moving around a little and hovering over about a week.
